title: I have to reproduce this
content:
anybody knows something close to this?

comments.content:
I think it looks like [Galliard Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011042653/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-galliard/) or Ultra. The big QB may be something else.

- Mike Yanega
